QuestData.Title: Rescue the Earthspeaker!
QuestData.Description: Good! You've brought allies.$b$bYou must hurry if we are to rescue Erunak.$b$bFight your way through Neptulon's halls. Find the shaman and free him from these worms... if he still lives.$b$bDon't worry about them coming up from behind you. Nothing's making it past me!
QuestData.RewardText: What is this? You... rescuing me?$b$b<Erunak smiles at you.>$b$bThis will take some getting used to.
